2017-10-17: Files to process the polbooks graph's ego networks
get them into an igraph ensemble, and compute the graph matrix using the graph kernel
library (https://www.bsse.ethz.ch/mlcb/research/machine-learning/graph-kernels.html).

polbooks data: /Users/mukundraj/Desktop/work/projects/kerneldepth/kerneldepth/data/2017-10-12/polbooks
